mapper.insert: INSERT INTO about_me_detail (about_id, title, content, sort) VALUES (#{aboutId}, #{title}, #{content}, (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(sort), -1) + 1 FROM about_me_detail))
mapper.update: UPDATE about_me_detail SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE detail_id = #{detailId}
mapper.select: SELECT about_id FROM about_me_detail WHERE detail_id = #{detailId}
